definition: to implement the law/to perform sorcery
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The paladin's number of spells per day does not increase after 20th level.
sentences.chinese: 圣骑士的每日施法数量不会在20级后继续增加。

sentences.english: I considered you while doing my Horoscope last night, and meditated.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我施法占星术时选中了你。

sentences.english: TPC:It allows the spellcaster to telepathically contact someone that they know personally.
sentences.chinese: 它允许施法者通过心灵感应联接一个他本人认识的人。

sentences.english: So, she used her magic and kept the villagers out of the forest; the two love birds were hence well protected.
sentences.chinese: 于是，施法将村民们赶出了森林，保护了这对恋人。

sentences.english: Use the following list for spur-of-the-moment adventure seeds involving arcane spell casters.
sentences.chinese: 在涉及奥术施法者的启发冒险时刻，使用下列清单。

sentences.english: Exploding Dragon sometimes hits 2x if the target is moving during the animation.
sentences.chinese: 当目标移动时施法，爆炎龙有时会造成2连击。

sentences.english: Reagents; Arcane Powder Summom a water Elemental to fight for the caster.
sentences.chinese: 用奥术粉末试剂召唤一个水元素为施法者战斗。

sentences.english: Class cheung and dense months looked at, and casting that fate of mummies openings recognizes caddie ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 班祥与密月见状，施法使干尸开口道出逆天童野心。

sentences.english: The caster summons a pack of Barghests.
sentences.chinese: 施法者将召唤出一组犬魔。

sentences.english: Each rune has an individual 10 second cooldown when used successfully.
sentences.chinese: 成功施法后，每个符文有10秒冷却时间。

sentences.english: Someone has been stealing component pouches from merchants and individual spell casters alike.
sentences.chinese: 有人把法术材料袋从商家和落单的施法者那里盗走。

sentences.english: One day an evil sorcerer cast a spell upon the mountain and the flow immediately stopped.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，一个邪恶的巫师施法后山和流动立即停止。

sentences.english: Well, it's got to be pretty low since V is a primary spellcaster.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，应该很低吧，因为V的初始职业是施法者。

sentences.english: A spellcaster has been releasing summoned creatures into a neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 一名施法者把召唤来的生物释放进临近的地区。

sentences.english: The pushback resistance part of the Battlecast Garb set bonus does not seem to be functioning.
sentences.chinese: 战斗施法二件套的抵抗施法条被击退的效果并未生效。

sentences.english: The pushback resistance part of the Battlecast Garb set bonus does not seem to be functioning.
sentences.chinese: 战斗施法二件套的抵抗施法条被击退的效果并未生效。

definition: to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
to chant a magic spell/to recite incantations
to use fully/to put to use
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
